page.title: 11SCHOOL LIFE: UPMINSTER
page.content: As well as{academic work}there are many{activities}available at school. We have{a swimming pool,}which is unusual,a{sports hall,gym,& a sports {field.}Trips, like{skiing & adventure {holidays, language exchanges, & {educational visits}are organised. Forms often go on daytrips:ice skating or just a day out. {Exams}in all subjects are held at the end of each year, followed by a{Sports {Day}with a trophy for the best house. School begins at 9.10 with 4{lessons until lunch at 12.05,& 3 between 1.30 & 3.30.In break times we stay in form rooms or go to the library.Every week we have an{assembly}for worship,awards & news.At the end of year 5 we take {GCE or CSE}exams in subjects chosen in year 3.We have 13 weeks{holiday}each year with 6 before the new school year beginning in September.
